PrologParser

Class Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • PrologParser.Parser
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DB, DBSchema

    public class Parser
extends java.lang.Object
    this is a simple line-parser for database and schema specifications Generally this class is internal to PrologDB package and should not be called externally

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Parser()

      a table declaration is on a single line.

        public Parser()

    • Method Detail

      • parseDBaseDecl

        public static DBSchema parseDBaseDecl(java.lang.String line,
                                      int lineno,
                                      java.util.List<java.lang.String> tableNames)
        a dbase declaration is on a single line. this method parses the given line @ lineno returning the DBSchema given declared name, also returns a list of tableNames (not their schemas). ParseExceptions thrown if unable to parse
        Parameters:
        line - -- a string
        lineno - -- the line number associated with this line
        tableNames - -- an empty list which is to be filled with table names
        Returns:
        DBSchema object with name of schema initialized; also returns list of tableNames -- to be used later in parsing

      • parseSubTableDecl

        public static void parseSubTableDecl(java.lang.String line,
                                     int lineno,
                                     DBSchema dbs)
        a subtable declaration is on a single line. this method parses the given line at lineno and adds the subtable declaration to DBSchema dbs. A ParseException is thrown if something wrong (parse or semantic error) is discovered.
        Parameters:
        line - to parse
        lineno - of line
        dbs - to add subtable definition

      • parseTableDecl

        public static void parseTableDecl(java.lang.String line,
                                  int lineno,
                                  DBSchema dbs)
                           throws Error
        a table declaration is on a single line. this method parses the given line @ lineno and adds the table definition to schema dbs
        Parameters:
        line - to parse
        lineno - of line
        dbs - to add table declaration
        Throws:
        Error - -- when parsing errors occurs

      • parseTableDecl

        public static TableSchema parseTableDecl(java.lang.String line,
                                         int lineno)
                                  throws Error
        a table declaration is on a single line. this method parses the given line @ lineno; returns tableschema
        Parameters:
        line - to parse
        lineno - of line
        Returns:
        TableSchema of line input
        Throws:
        Error - -- when parsing errors occurs

      • parseTupleDecl

        protected static void parseTupleDecl(java.lang.String line,
                                     int lineno,
                                     DB db)
        parses a line at lineno, expecting to parse a legal prolog tuple declaration. The extracted tuple is inserted into database db; the possible table declarations are defined in db.getSchema() of the database
        Parameters:
        line - to parse
        lineno - line number of the line
        db - database in which to insert
